channel.title: Anyone help on 508 server making
channel.description: ok I followed instructions in Tony's TuT and i get 2 errors, in the client i type in the ip to my server..which should be 0.0.0.0 correct? Anyways, I get the error "error_game_js5connect" and for my source ( Espeon HD ) I try to run it and I get the error.. umm don't really know I click run and command prompt comes up and instantly disappears...All I see is green writing :confused:

item.title: Anyone help on 508 server making
item.dc:creator: @nadnerb_doow nadnerb_doow
item.description:
@nadnerb_doow wrote:

The fact that your server is not running is why your client is giving you the js5connect error - it can’t find your server to connect to. I suggest adding the word “pause” to the end of your server run.bat, like so:

java Server more stuff and parameters here usually
pause

This should stop the command prompt from closing instantly and it should instead give you time to read the error. Once we know the error, we’ll be able to help you more.

Read full topic
